■ Y OF iLi
November 8, 1956
Frank E. Schooley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Oear Frank:
Attached you will find a letter from a Lester
Lindow of WFDF, Flint, Michigan. What is the NAEB
POSITION REGARDING APBE AND WHAT IS YOUR CURRENT
PERSONAL OPINION OF IT? IS ILLINOIS A MEMBER?
YOU WILL NOTE IN THE FOURTH PARAGRAPH OF THE
Lindow letter that he mentions the first issue of the
Journal of Broadcasting* What effect will this have
on our AERT Journal or its heir?
Trust you had no trouble in finding your way
back to Chicago and that you will have no trouble on
the gridiron this week-end.
Sincerely,
James s. Miles
Director, Radio Station WBAA
JSM:ec
Enc.
THE VOICE OF
PURDUE
